page.title: 01GENERAL INFORMATION
page.content: This are covers a largely{residential {and industrial}part of the town of Workington. The industry is concentrated in a strip along the coast with the residentail area to the east on slightly higher ground.The area had an{important industrial past but that has changed dramatically over the last 10 years.{High rates of {unemployment}exist in the area and great efforts are being made to encourage new industries to develop here,hence the regions status as an {Enterprise Zone.}The steel industry is still the most important industry in this area,but this is a shadow of it's former self.The area inclides those parts of Workington called {Harrington,Mossbay,Salterbeck, {Westfield and part of Moorclose.}These last three areas make up a large council housing estate.
